title: What is the summary of the first voyage around the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Magellan had already reached the Malay Archipelago in Southeast Asia on previous voyages traveling east (from 1505 to 1511–1512). By visiting this area again but now travelling west, Magellan achieved a nearly complete personal circumnavigation of the globe for the first time in history. (Wikipedia)Electing to stay in Mactan, P.I., Magellan wished his fleet good luck in their return voyage to Portugal.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Ana Cristy Delicano
